creditline: Gift of Stephen Addiss and Audrey Yoshiko Seo
description: two lines of large, bold calligraphy--4 characters in each line; two red seals at left edge, below center; one red seal, URC
inscription: 龍啀乕嘨　兎走鳥飛
markings: the red seals; 公美and 龍
text:
The rendering of the calligraphy embodies the characteristics of the animals described: the sinuous dragon, the crouched tiger, the darting rabbit, and the free bird. Read from the top right, down, and over to the left column:
“Dragons Growl
Tigers Roar
Rabbit Dash
Birds Soar”

龍啀乕嘨　兎走鳥飛
title: Dragons Growl
